analysis.description:
EnjinBuyer.fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0xb186afcd36a6403ec957f5c74482aaac13b87eae.sol#80-98) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(this.balance == 0)

Reentrancy in EnjinBuyer.withdraw_token (/unique_chucks/28/0xb186afcd36a6403ec957f5c74482aaac13b87eae.sol#47-67):

	- contract_token_balance = myToken.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb186afcd36a6403ec957f5c74482aaac13b87eae.sol#56-58)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/28/0xb186afcd36a6403ec957f5c74482aaac13b87eae.sol#61-62)
